name: Not All Of Them Died (And They had Beef)
name_original: Not All Of Them Died (And They had Beef)
description:
Move - WSAD

Look - Mouse

Escape to Quit

The total number of graves in the game is around 150,000. The names of real people were not used and any similarities with people living or dead is a coincidence.

NOTE: The Windows version of the file called "_compo" was entered for Ludum Dare 29; it is missing assets taken from the internet. People not interested in judging for the competition are encouraged to play the normal Windows version.
